modName: Transgender body and race CBBE UNP
summary: Body replacement and or race for female.
descriptionHtml:
This mod is an experiment and in a very early stage. Since I can\'t get models to work when extracted from 3dsMax, I had to do everything in NifSkope (and photoshop). So it isn\'t perfect, some texture glitches exist and I couldn\'t edit any meshes.

I made this by combining Calientes Female Body replacement (SLIM)/UNPb and Better Males by Chris57. The female textures I used are from HighRes 4K CBBE Nude Female Re-Texture Mod by Khajitsree, because of a unwrap-map problem I needed a higher res texture.

I will try to improve it as best I can, but because of the 3dsMax issue, I cannot make it perfect... If anyone knows how to solve this, please feel free to share that info :)

TG RACES (under main files)
Adds new races for all vanilla humans, orcs and elves.

  1. Open console
  2. Click on Player/NPC (preferably female)
  3. Type: \"setrace TG[Insert Race Here]Race\" 
  (eg. setrace TGNordRace)
  
  You can also use ShowRaceMenu, SetPlayerRace or start a new game.
  
  Available races:
  Nord 
  Breton 
  Redguard
  Imperial
  Darkelf
  Highelf
  Woodelf
  Orc

*Uses body textures/meshes separated under \"textures/TGRace\" \"meshes/TGRace\"
*Uses global female face textures for now (vanilla or custom)
*Male characters not implemented (use on female)
*Vampire race not yet added
*I will add a CBBE version
*Bugs may exist
author: ls
